product_name: Continental Trail King Protection 29er Folding Tire - 29 x 2.2 / 29 x 2.4
long_description: The Continental Trail King Protection 29er Folding Tire delivers solid handling and control for your big-wheeled trail rides. It features reinforced sidewalls for extra protection against punctures. Designed to handle all-mountain riding with confidence, aggressive side knobs hook up well when cornering; open center tread pattern clears mud quickly. Tread pattern also offers responsive handling and braking in wet, muddy conditions. The Continental Trail King Protection 29er Folding Tire features a 240tpi casing with steel wire bead.
short_description: The Continental Trail King Protection 29er Folding Tire delivers solid handling and control for your big-wheeled trail rides. It features reinforced sidewalls for extra protection against punctures.
